*Overview*

Facility page has input option for latitude and longitude but longitude is wrongly set to take value between [-90, 90]. *Longitude range is between [-180, 180]

*Steps to reproduce*

1. Select a facility
2. Go to update facilitty
3. Longitude doesnot accept value beyond 90 or less than -90

*Expected Behaviour*

Longitude should accept value in range [-180, 180] (including)

☑︎ 1. Deprecates existing `patient_category` of DailyRound and `category` of PatientConsultation to `deprecated_covid_category`
☑︎ 2. Migrations for the renamed deprecated fields.
☑︎ 3. Adds *mandatory* fields `patient_category` in DailyRound and `category` in PatientConsultation with new `CATEGORY_CHOICES`.
☑︎ 4. Migrations for the newly created fields.

attachments.fallback: 2660x498px image
attachments.text:
*Proposed Changes*

• Removed in-memory table `MedibaseMedicinesTable` and support for in-memory search.
• Adds GIN Index on the Medicines table (+ migration to install the Postgres extension)
• Annotates and orders with search rank (priority: `generic`, `name`, `company`, `cims_class`, `contents`)
• Updated API endpoint and views to reflect the changes and support for pagination.

*Before: with the in-memory table (93ms ~ 128ms)*
<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/251434444-f0c772d1-2305-43eb-9532-ef21722bc2f6.png|image>
*After: Search on Postgres with GIN Index and order by `SearchRank` (122ms ~ 170ms)*

(Postgres is not on the same machine; on a Linux machine on the same local network)

<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/251543199-ac6b5432-f900-4edd-9abe-4c0417afbee4.png|image>
*Index Size (~64 MB)*
<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/251542588-587b2c07-bc84-4fb7-82ce-42a3c645e646.png|image>
*Merge Checklist*

☑︎ Tests added/fixed
☐ Update docs in `/docs`
☑︎ Linting Complete
☐ Any other necessary step

__Only PR's with test cases included and passing lint and test pipelines will be reviewed__

@ohcnetwork/care-backend-maintainers @ohcnetwork/care-backend-admins

*EOD 10/07/2023 <!subteam^S035L5S02RF|@care_engineering>* 

*How did the day go?*

• <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/1443|care#1443>: Optimized medibase in-memory by loading directly from ORM's `values_list`  
    ◦ compared to staging: :point_down: 
    ◦ Search performance: Almost same fast performance as old in-memory *(P50 latency: ~55ms)*
    ◦ *idle memory usage* down from _~1.1GB_ to _~380mb_ *(~63% improved)*
    ◦ load test *max_mem usage*: down from sub ~_1.2GB + memory leaks_ to sub 500mb w/o. memory leaks *(~60% improved)*
    ◦ *time to load to in-memory from DB table*: down from 5.1 seconds to ~525ms *(~1000% improved)*
*What's next?*
• Follow up on zoomdrive script
• Follow up on configurable gain for vitals monitor

attachments.text:
*WHAT*
*:robot_face: Generated by Copilot at <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/commit/3208faceb1e2323edd8f4779e10f87c1bd883fb3|3208fac>*

This pull request adds and modifies several files to implement the feature of editing prescriptions from the `PrescriptionAdministrationsTable` component. It adds toast notifications for global form errors, refactors the validation logic for the prescription form, adds type definitions for the prescription API routes, and adds custom hooks for extracting slugs from the URL. It also fixes a formatting issue in the localization file and adds a `value` prop to the `NumericWithUnitsFormField` component.

*Proposed Changes*

• Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/6340|#6340>
• Adds hook `useSlug` to retrieve path params from the route to remove the pain of passing it to deeply nested components.
• Fixed bug: `NumericWithUnitsFormField` not showing initial value

<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/271515071-d36c2e33-3406-44d0-b5fc-a6c4ef07ef69.png|image> <https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/271515133-39d63e06-ee52-48e1-a5a0-4fb2cc21c806.png|image> <https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/271515184-19bc733c-96ea-45cd-a4d4-fc51e293bf0e.png|image> <https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/271515256-ed8ca4fb-1f7f-4600-a826-98d599e578ea.png|image>

@ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers @ohcnetwork/code-reviewers

*Merge Checklist*

☐ Add specs that demonstrate bug / test a new feature.
☐ Update <https://docs.coronasafe.network/coronasafe-care-documentation/architecture/architecture-and-layering-of-care|product documentation>.
☐ Ensure that UI text is kept in I18n files.
☐ Prep screenshot or demo video for changelog entry, and attach it to issue.
☐ Request for Peer Reviews
☐ Completion of QA

*HOW*
*:robot_face: Generated by Copilot at <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/commit/3208faceb1e2323edd8f4779e10f87c1bd883fb3|3208fac>*

• Add two custom hooks `useSlug` and `useSlugs` to extract slugs from the current path based on prefixes (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-c310c89b769df358f58f54862c57d7219fcf4b05062a82e2cd54da588d4f28b1R1-R45|link>)
• Add a global error message property `$all` to the `FormErrors` type and display it using toast notifications in the `Form` component (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-69ec69794429da354604f57d8d5be26c6b5fc2de640f2d670acda3543cec0bbdL4-R6|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-1c65fcfe59a39c2fa19c4b333f9dd48e6a8d3c933e82585253b941f8bec98d3eR10|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-1c65fcfe59a39c2fa19c4b333f9dd48e6a8d3c933e82585253b941f8bec98d3eR55-R58|link>)
• Add a `value` prop to the `NumericWithUnitsFormField` component to pass the numeric value of the field (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-68c921c72ca740919481f0b7bb832b6fdb181affcaea8c0dbf7972522a091913R37|link>)
• Extract the validation logic for creating a prescription to a separate function `PrescriptionFormValidator` and import it in the `CreatePrescriptionForm` component (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-a1d1441d26a2799a1c7d13f82517edb80926e28c181dc5d5012646a67cccaef0R14|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-a1d1441d26a2799a1c7d13f82517edb80926e28c181dc5d5012646a67cccaef0L43-R44|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-100d45a25307e4e7a06c8dd98416bac6ec661ff791c503418dfd6dab5f7e4d0dR1-R49|link>)
• Add a new component `EditPrescriptionForm` for editing an existing prescription, which takes an initial prescription object and a callback function as props, and renders a form with the same fields as the `CreatePrescriptionForm` component, but with the initial values populated (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-f17acfb34396783a40ddefa08f87e28f01fac5ce711b1c76594a6adf38eaade8R1-R158|link>)
• Add a validation function `EditPrescriptionFormValidator` for editing a prescription, which takes an old and a new prescription object as arguments, and calls the `PrescriptionFormValidator` function on the new object, and also checks if the objects are the same, and if so, adds a global error message (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-100d45a25307e4e7a06c8dd98416bac6ec661ff791c503418dfd6dab5f7e4d0dR1-R49|link>)
• Add an `Edit` button to the `PrescriptionRow` component in the `PrescriptionAdministrationsTable` component, which shows a modal dialog with the `EditPrescriptionForm` component when clicked (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-72e4733fee5da36cd347a741a637541d37363b7ecd2280dcc5ce01d6aa173150R23|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-72e4733fee5da36cd347a741a637541d37363b7ecd2280dcc5ce01d6aa173150R303|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-72e4733fee5da36cd347a741a637541d37363b7ecd2280dcc5ce01d6aa173150R392-R406|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-72e4733fee5da36cd347a741a637541d37363b7ecd2280dcc5ce01d6aa173150R416-R443|link>)
• Add the `id` property as required to the `BasePrescription` type (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-b6d89e365687bdfdf20171e060aa22bd7141ac636df57d9b7b3c0ab46b180448L4-R4|link>)
• Add the `TBody` and `TRes` properties to the `createPrescription` and `discontinuePrescription` routes in the `api.tsx` file, which specify the types of the request and response bodies for the API routes (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-21639e8b3b95469edd34a3d2641a85e6eb02393c442301e11d91665f10f1cf7cR4|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-21639e8b3b95469edd34a3d2641a85e6eb02393c442301e11d91665f10f1cf7cR976-R977|link>, <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-21639e8b3b95469edd34a3d2641a85e6eb02393c442301e11d91665f10f1cf7cR1003-R1004|link>)
• Add two new entries to the `Medicine.json` file for the caution note and the reason for edit field in the `EditPrescriptionForm` component (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-7e3945ff400caa2c6199744b03e75ab24909eb06ff93f3a0b18b239f491b1bb0L36-R38|link>)
• Remove an unused import statement for the `FieldError` type in the `CreatePrescriptionForm.tsx` file (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-a1d1441d26a2799a1c7d13f82517edb80926e28c181dc5d5012646a67cccaef0L1-R1|link>)
• Remove a trailing comma from the last entry in the `Medicine.json` file (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6369/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-7e3945ff400caa2c6199744b03e75ab24909eb06ff93f3a0b18b239f491b1bb0L50-L49|link>)

• Reviewed the cookiecutter template PR and made <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care-plugin-cookiecutter/pull/2/files/ae14f0a6bb64ca4395b213a3824b4e95b5b810b3..b36c35c048dd3aae78fb07ab76ddc35ae5a53fea|pushed some enhancements>.
• Unplanned: Majority of the day went in debugging why leaderboard deployment started failing since 2 days ago due to a type error that came out of nowhere only in CF pages builds.
    ◦ Tried many ways (switching node version, react version, upgrading lockfile from fresh, etc…), unable to reproduce locally.
    ◦ Tried switching to switching to another build command in cf pages configuration, same issue. 
    ◦ <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/leaderboard/pull/553|Tried upgrading to nextjs 15>. Builds take too much memory. Receiving SIGKILL threatenings from netlify preview builds… :confused: 
    ◦ <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/leaderboard/commit/40543275566417ab729df952ed72648c2e60c065|Upgrading to React 19> seems to have solved it. Not sure why issue was not replicable with previous version of react locally and happened only on cf pages builds.
• Worked on trying to modify request function such that it can be used with react-query’s `queryFn` along with our API routes defined in FE. Ended up realising it’s cleaner to build a separate dedicated one to avoid unnecessary complications in the implementation.
*Up Next*
• Raise PR on react-query using care’s request with few more usages.
• Questionnaire: Complete wiring medication request and allergy APIs
• Leaderboard: explore a way to scale points based on story points and making points allocation logic more customisable.
• Complete Appointments ui and start integrating APIs
